text: Jennifer Aniston split from her second husband, Justin Theroux, in February. And the 49 - year - old Friends vet told the Hollywood Foreign Press recently she got over the heartbreak with frequent therapy sessions, according to UsWeekly.'It takes a lot of therapy but you do absolutely get over it,'she was heard saying. A source for the magazine added that she was very careful to'take care of herself'after the split.
